price: En esto hay mensaje suficiente para un pueblo que realmente adora a Dios.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي هَٰذَا لَبَلَٰغٗا لِّقَوۡمٍ عَٰبِدِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: inna fī hādhā labalāghan liqawmin ʿābidīna
